titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring the cessation of hostility and preserving an entire amity between His Majesty and the King of Spain
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the 10/20 day of September, in the twelfth year of our reign, 1660."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
